location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No. 12: Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident in the Persian Gulf, Bushire, to William Newnham, Chief Secretary to Government, Bombay

mods.abstract: In this letter Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident in the Persian Gulf, Bushire, refers to William Newnham's letter of 11 December 1823, and promises that, on his next visit to the Arabian coast, he will ascertain the manner in which the Beni Boo Ali [Banī Bū ‘Alī] Arabs have been reinstated in their original seats. Stannus states that, in the meantime, he will make enquiries on the subject and will report to Newnham accordingly.
